entry.title: About Me
entry.content:
Shyam Rallapalli

I am a plant science graduate with a keen interest and experience in bioinformatic applications for research. I have an extensive knowledge of next generation sequencing and their applications, especially RNAseq, ChIPseq, variant analysis and genome annotation.

In my current role I am working on the alignments from Fraxinus, a citizen science project of short read sequence alignments by humans. Additionally I maintain OpenAshDieBack (OADB) blog and github and help Martin Page with OADB geeFu.
